title: Demi Lovato debuts new T tattoo in honor of her late friend Tomas Trusell lll
text:
She's currently mourning the loss of her late friend, Tomas Trusell lll, who passed away last week following an overdose.

And Demi Lovato has now debuted her new tattoo on her forearm to commemorate her late friend.

The 27-year-old opted for the letter 'T' in calligraphy to honor Tommy. It sits above the rose she had drawn in 2015.

A lovely tribute: Demi Lovato debuted her new tattoo on Tuesday in which she got to honor her late friend who passed away last week following an overdose

'A T for Tommy. RIP you special angel. Love you forever @sirtruss. thank you for the ink @rafael_valdez.. it’s beautiful and I’m so grateful for this,' she captioned.

And it wasn't just Demi getting the tattoo, with many of Tommy's closest friends all coming together to ink their love.

Hailey Baldwin's stylist, Maeve Reilly, was also there and documented the experience.

honor: 'A T for Tommy. RIP you special angel. Love you forever @sirtruss. thank you for the ink @rafael_valdez.. it’s beautiful and I’m so grateful for this,' she captioned

Honoring her pal: Demi shared a touching post last week after finding out about the death of her friend who struggled with addiction, something she's also experienced in the past

'Love you Tommy. Will forever say your name.'

Demi shared a touching post last week after finding out about the death of her friend who struggled with addiction, something she has also experienced in the past.

'Devastated. Please hold your loved ones tight. Tell them they are special and that you love them. Make sure they know it,' she penned.

'RIP to my boo @sirtruss [three heart emojis],' she shared on Instagram, along with black and white snaps of Tommy.'

Doing it together: Hailey Baldwin's stylist, Maeve Reilly, joined Demi and others to get tattoos in honor of Tommy on Monday evening

New ink: Maeve got Tommy's full name in calligraphy

The post comes nearly 15-months after she was hospitalized due to a drug overdose.

Demi continued: 'Addiction is NO joke. heaven gained this beautiful angel last night because of that terrible disease. I’m crushed and will always miss you @sirtruss. If you or someone you know is struggling please know it’s okay to ask for help.'

On October 8 the Los Angeles Fire Department responded to a medical call for a male at 8.06am and found the LA-based model dead at the scene.

'He was found deceased on the scene. No transport was made to the hospital,' an LAFD spokesperson said.

14 months ago saw the Sober singer found unconscious in her Hollywood home following six years of sobriety.

Gone too soon: Maeve also penned a touching post on social media the day after Tommy's death

This summer marked her one year anniversary of sobriety following her overdose.

After weeks in hospital, Demi was relocated to a rehab clinic where she worked on her battle with addictions once again.

Maeve also penned a touching post on social media the day after Tommy's death.

'My best friend and little brother overdosed and died yesterday. It’s taken me a day to write anything down,' she began.

'I loved you so much Tommy. You lit up every room. You loved hard. You showed up for your friends. You wanted to be sober so bad. You really tried. I watched you. Countless relapses but you always came back.'

She continued: 'We laughed and cried. You baby sat me through my breakup 6 months ago. You didn’t leave my side. You showed up for me everyday. We saw or spoke to each other everyday. We had the most random fun. It looked like I was taking care of You. But you were taking care of me.'

'I have watched people die of the disease of addiction before but never someone this close to me. I will cherish you in my heart forever Tommy. You are gone too f**king soon.'
description: Demi Lovato debuted her new tattoo on Tuesday in which she got to honor her late friend who passed away last week following an overdose.
